text: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
speaker: Jesus

text: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
speaker: David

text: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
speaker: Moses

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
speaker: Paul

text: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
speaker: Solomon

text: Jesus wept.
speaker: John

text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
speaker: Paul

text: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the Lord, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
speaker: Jeremiah

text: But they that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles.
speaker: Isaiah

text: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
speaker: David

text: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the Most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.
speaker: David

text: I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
speaker: Jesus

text: For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
speaker: Paul

text: And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind.
speaker: Paul

text: But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.
speaker: Jesus

text: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
speaker: John

text: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of knowledge: but fools despise wisdom and instruction.
speaker: Solomon

text: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
speaker: Jesus

text: Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the Lord thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.
speaker: God

text: And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.
speaker: John

text: Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost.
speaker: Jesus

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God.
speaker: Paul

text: Rejoice in the Lord always: and again I say, Rejoice.
speaker: Paul

text: Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up.
speaker: Paul

text: Fear not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God.
speaker: Isaiah

text: Be still, and know that I am God: I will be exalted among the heathen, I will be exalted in the earth.
speaker: Sons of Korah

text: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the Lord is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?
speaker: David

text: Create in me a clean heart, O God; and renew a right spirit within me.
speaker: David

text: Iron sharpeneth iron; so a man sharpeneth the countenance of his friend.
speaker: Solomon

text: A soft answer turneth away wrath: but grievous words stir up anger.
speaker: Solomon

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith.
speaker: Paul

text: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.
speaker: Paul

text: And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
speaker: Paul

text: For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God.
speaker: Paul

text: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
speaker: John

text: I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit.
speaker: Jesus

text: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.
speaker: Jesus

text: But he was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him.
speaker: Isaiah

text: The grass withereth, the flower fadeth: but the word of our God shall stand for ever.
speaker: Isaiah

text: If my people, which are called by my name, shall humble themselves, and pray, and seek my face, and turn from their wicked ways; then will I hear from heaven.
speaker: God

text: Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him.
speaker: Jesus

text: For the word of God is quick, and powerful, and sharper than any twoedged sword.
speaker: Paul

text: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.
speaker: Paul

text: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights.
speaker: James

text: But be ye doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving your own selves.
speaker: James

text: Cast all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
speaker: Peter

text: But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts: and be ready always to give an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you.
speaker: Peter

text: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward.
speaker: Peter

text: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.
speaker: John

text: For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not grievous.
speaker: John

text: And we know that the Son of God is come, and hath given us an understanding, that we may know him that is true.
speaker: John

text: Contend for the faith which was once delivered unto the saints.
speaker: Jude

text: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.
speaker: Jesus

text: And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying.
speaker: John

text: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.
speaker: John

text: Blessed is the man that walketh not in the counsel of the ungodly, nor standeth in the way of sinners.
speaker: David

text: I will bless the Lord at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.
speaker: David

text: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
speaker: David

text: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
speaker: Sons of Korah

text: Make a joyful noise unto the Lord, all ye lands.
speaker: David
